subject: feat(mvp): implement full MVP — phases 1-7
body:
Complete implementation of all 7 phases of the budgy-ting product definition:

Phase 1 — Budget Management:
  - BudgetForm (create/edit), BudgetCreateView, BudgetEditView
  - Cascade delete (expenses + actuals), ConfirmDialog component

Phase 2 — Expense Management:
  - ExpenseForm with category autocomplete from IndexedDB
  - ExpensesTab grouped by category, edit/delete per item
  - useCategoryAutocomplete composable

Phase 3 — Projection Engine:
  - Pure TypeScript engine handling all 6 frequency types
  - Partial month and boundary clamping logic
  - ProjectedTab with by-item/by-category toggle

Phase 4 — Import Wizard:
  - CSV parser (RFC 4180), JSON parser, column auto-detection
  - 3-pass matching engine (exact, fuzzy, amount-only)
  - 4-step wizard: upload, map, review/approve, confirm

Phase 5 — Comparison Views:
  - Variance calculation engine
  - Line item, category, monthly views with CSS bar charts
  - Overspend/underspend colour coding with 5% tolerance

Phase 6 — Export/Import:
  - JSON export with comparison snapshot, browser download
  - Restore from backup (replace/merge), schema validation
  - Clear all data with confirmation

Phase 7 — PWA Polish:
  - usePWA composable (install prompt, SW update detection)
  - Install app button in header, update banner

Tags: mvp, vue3, budget, expenses, projection, import, comparison, export, pwa
Complexity: 5
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: medium
Debt: added
Epic: mvp-implementation
Semver: minor
